body.p: Documentation designed for Gentoo developers and those aspiring to become one, and instructions how to avoid the pending OpenLDAP upgrade to become a rough ride for Gentoo users are the main news in this week's Gentoo Weekly Newsletter. International news dominate this edition, with a major artwork service migrating to a Gentoo Linux server environment, Palm-OS-versions of the Gentoo handbook, user meetings in Germany and a Linux and Open-Source meeting in Austria. Check Gentoo in the press for lots of interesting Gentoo sightings in publications worldwide, and don't forget to welcome our latest additions to the developer team, our bug statistics, and the security announcements. Have fun reading the latest GWN!
